https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null With a little help from an angel, Mercedes Wright, a fast-talking popular relationship therapist with all the answers when it comes to fixing everyone else's marriage, must now use the magic of Christmas to find the secret to save her own. A Miracle Before Christmas
